meanings.definition: To make superficial or cosmetic changes to something.
meanings.sent1: She cosmeticizes her room by adding new curtains and pillows.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to cosmeticize their logo to attract younger customers.
meanings.sent3: He always cosmeticizes his excuses to make them sound more believable.
meanings.sent4: The politician cosmeticizes his speeches to hide the lack of substance.
meanings.sent5: The artist cosmeticizes the landscape, adding vibrant colors and exaggerated features.

meanings.definition: To apply cosmetics or makeup to enhance appearance.
meanings.sent1: She cosmeticizes her face before going to a party.
meanings.sent2: The actress cosmeticizes before every performance to look her best.
meanings.sent3: He cosmeticizes his pet hamster for fun, giving it a tiny hat and bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The magician cosmeticizes his assistant, transforming her into a mystical creature.
meanings.sent5: The model cosmeticizes with precision, highlighting her features for the photoshoot.
